channel.title: Image Generation on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in Image Generation on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: Inference-Time Scaling for Flow Models via Stochastic Generation and Rollover Budget Forcing
item.description: Inference-time scaling for flow models enhances alignment with user preferences via stochastic generation and budget allocation.

item.title: CFG-Zero*: Improved Classifier-Free Guidance for Flow Matching Models
item.description: CFG-Zero*: A better Classifier-Free Guidance to improve the image quality and text alignment in Flow Matching models.

item.title: Diffusion-4K: Ultra-High-Resolution Image Synthesis with Latent Diffusion Models
item.description: Diffusion-4K: Synthesizing ultra-high-resolution images with a new benchmark dataset and wavelet-based fine-tuning that makes 4K image creation more detailed and accessible!

item.title: Equivariant Image Modeling
item.description: Aligning image generation subtasks: Equivariant modeling boosts efficiency and generalization by leveraging natural visual signal invariance.

item.title: Latent Space Super-Resolution for Higher-Resolution Image Generation with Diffusion Models
item.description: LSRNA: Super-resolution in latent space enhances image generation with diffusion models, achieving faster speeds and improved detail.

item.title: Training-free Diffusion Acceleration with Bottleneck Sampling
item.description: Bottleneck Sampling: Accelerate diffusion models without retraining by cleverly using low-resolution priors for efficient inference!

item.title: RDTF: Resource-efficient Dual-mask Training Framework for Multi-frame Animated Sticker Generation
item.description: RDTF: Efficient animated sticker generation via dual-mask training, outperforming parameter-efficient tuning under constrained resources.

item.title: When Preferences Diverge: Aligning Diffusion Models with Minority-Aware Adaptive DPO
item.description: Adaptive Diffusion Models with Minority-Aware Adaptive DPO

item.title: Bridging Continuous and Discrete Tokens for Autoregressive Visual Generation
item.description: TokenBridge bridges continuous and discrete tokens for autoregressive visual generation, achieving high-quality synthesis with simple autoregressive modeling.

item.title: Expert Race: A Flexible Routing Strategy for Scaling Diffusion Transformer with Mixture of Experts
item.description: Expert Race: A flexible routing strategy for scaling diffusion transformer with mixture of experts.

item.title: Improving Autoregressive Image Generation through Coarse-to-Fine Token Prediction
item.description: Coarse-to-Fine Token Prediction improves autoregressive image generation by assigning the same coarse label for similar tokens, balancing generation quality and computational efficiency.

item.title: InfiniteYou: Flexible Photo Recrafting While Preserving Your Identity
item.description: InfU: A new framework for flexible photo re-creation while preserving identity using Diffusion Transformers(DiTs).

item.title: MagicMotion: Controllable Video Generation with Dense-to-Sparse Trajectory Guidance
item.description: MagicMotion: A controllable video generation framework enabling precise object motion control through dense-to-sparse trajectory guidance.

item.title: Scale-wise Distillation of Diffusion Models
item.description: SWD: Scale-wise distillation of diffusion models achieves faster image generation by upscaling resolution during denoising, outperforming counterparts with similar computation.

item.title: Tokenize Image as a Set
item.description: TokenSet: Tokenizing images as unordered sets for dynamic capacity allocation and robust generation, breaking from fixed-position latent codes.

item.title: Ultra-Resolution Adaptation with Ease
item.description: URA: Ultra-resolution adaptation made easy! Uses synthetic data & minor weight tuning for efficient, high-res text-to-image diffusion models.

item.title: Efficient Personalization of Quantized Diffusion Model without Backpropagation
item.description: Personalize diffusion models efficiently on devices without backpropagation.

item.title: LEGION: Learning to Ground and Explain for Synthetic Image Detection
item.description: LEGION: Grounding and explaining synthetic image detection and refinement via multimodal learning.

item.title: Spot the Fake: Large Multimodal Model-Based Synthetic Image Detection with Artifact Explanation
item.description: FakeVLM: A multimodal model & artifact-annotated dataset for detecting synthetic images with interpretable explanations, setting a new benchmark.

item.title: Cosmos-Transfer1: Conditional World Generation with Adaptive Multimodal Control
item.description: Cosmos-Transfer1: An adaptable conditional world generation model using multimodal control.

item.title: DiffMoE: Dynamic Token Selection for Scalable Diffusion Transformers
item.description: DiffMoE: Dynamically selects tokens for scalable diffusion transformers, unlocking new efficiency levels in image generation.

item.title: BlobCtrl: A Unified and Flexible Framework for Element-level Image Generation and Editing
item.description: BlobCtrl: Precisely edit images at the element level with a unified, flexible framework, bridging the gap between generation and editing.

item.title: DreamRenderer: Taming Multi-Instance Attribute Control in Large-Scale Text-to-Image Models
item.description: DreamRenderer: Taming attribute control in large-scale text-to-image models with a plug-and-play, training-free approach for enhanced content creation.

item.title: Edit Transfer: Learning Image Editing via Vision In-Context Relations
item.description: Edit Transfer: Learns image edits from a single example and applies it to new images, surpassing text/reference-based methods!

item.title: Rewards Are Enough for Fast Photo-Realistic Text-to-image Generation
item.description: Rewards Are Enough!

item.title: Reflect-DiT: Inference-Time Scaling for Text-to-Image Diffusion Transformers via In-Context Reflection
item.description: Reflect-DiT: Scaling Text-to-Image Diffusion Transformers via In-Context Reflection!

item.title: Autoregressive Image Generation with Randomized Parallel Decoding
item.description: ARPG: Randomly generate high-quality images by parallel decoding, outperforming existing methods in efficiency, memory, and quality.

item.description: COSTA*: A cost-effective agent that smartly navigates AI tools to edit images with high quality and low cost, balancing user preferences!

item.description: PerCoV2: Open ultra-low bit-rate perceptual image compression using implicit hierarchical masked image modeling, built on Stable Diffusion 3 for bandwidth-constrained applications.

item.description: SANA-Sprint: An efficient diffusion model for ultra-fast text-to-image generation with continuous-time consistency distillation, achieving state-of-the-art performance in speed and quality.

item.description: New ‘Silent Branding Attack’ poisons text-to-image models, embedding brand logos without text prompts, raising ethical issues for image generation tools.

item.description: LightGen: Efficient image generation via knowledge distillation and direct preference optimization.

item.description: EasyControl: Efficient & flexible control for Diffusion Transformers, enabling sophisticated image generation.

item.description: PLADIS: Sparsity boosts attention for diffusion models, enhancing text-to-image generation at inference time!

item.description: RayFlow: Accelerating diffusion with instance-aware adaptive flow, boosting speed & quality!

item.description: Seedream 2.0: A native Chinese-English bilingual image generation model that understands cultural nuances and excels in text rendering.

item.description: WISE: Evaluates world knowledge in text-to-image generation.

item.description: Likelihood-based generative models get a GAN-like boost via a new Direct Discriminative Optimization, ditching the joint training complexity.

item.description: GCC: Color constancy through diffusion, inpainting a color checker for stable illumination estimation.

item.description: M3-AGIQA: A multimodal AI solution that comprehensively assesses AI-generated image quality, achieving state-of-the-art performance by distilling online MLLM capabilities into a local model.

item.description: PhotoDoodle: Mimicking artistic image editing with personalized decorative elements through learning from few-shot pairwise data.

item.description: OminiControl: A minimal, universal framework efficiently integrates image conditions into diffusion transformers, enabling diverse and precise control over image generation.

item.title: Style-Friendly SNR Sampler for Style-Driven Generation
item.description: Style-friendly SNR sampler biases diffusion model training towards higher noise levels, enabling it to learn and generate images with higher style fidelity.

item.title: TEXGen: a Generative Diffusion Model for Mesh Textures
item.description: TEXGen: A groundbreaking generative diffusion model creates high-resolution 3D mesh textures directly from text and image prompts, exceeding prior methods in quality and efficiency.

item.title: MyTimeMachine: Personalized Facial Age Transformation
item.description: MyTimeMachine personalizes facial age transformation using just 50 personal photos, outperforming existing methods by generating re-aged faces that closely match a person’s actual appearance at variou…

item.title: Stable Flow: Vital Layers for Training-Free Image Editing
item.description: Stable Flow achieves diverse, consistent image editing without training by strategically injecting source image features into specific ‘vital’ layers of a diffusion transformer model. This training-f…

item.title: VBench++: Comprehensive and Versatile Benchmark Suite for Video Generative Models
item.description: VBench++: A new benchmark suite meticulously evaluates video generative models across 16 diverse dimensions, aligning with human perception for improved model development and fairer comparisons.

item.title: Stylecodes: Encoding Stylistic Information For Image Generation
item.description: StyleCodes enables easy style sharing for image generation by encoding styles as compact strings, enhancing control and collaboration while minimizing quality loss.

item.title: Continuous Speculative Decoding for Autoregressive Image Generation
item.description: Researchers have developed Continuous Speculative Decoding, boosting autoregressive image generation speed by up to 2.33x while maintaining image quality.

item.title: FitDiT: Advancing the Authentic Garment Details for High-fidelity Virtual Try-on
item.description: FitDiT boosts virtual try-on realism by enhancing garment details via Diffusion Transformers, improving texture and size accuracy for high-fidelity virtual fashion.

item.title: MagicQuill: An Intelligent Interactive Image Editing System
item.description: MagicQuill: an intelligent interactive image editing system enabling intuitive, precise image edits via brushstrokes and real-time intent prediction by a multimodal LLM.

item.title: Add-it: Training-Free Object Insertion in Images With Pretrained Diffusion Models
item.description: Add-it: Training-free object insertion in images using pretrained diffusion models by cleverly balancing information from the scene, text prompt, and generated image, achieving state-of-the-art result…

item.title: Edify Image: High-Quality Image Generation with Pixel Space Laplacian Diffusion Models
item.description: Edify Image: groundbreaking pixel-perfect photorealistic image generation using cascaded pixel-space diffusion models with a novel Laplacian diffusion process, enabling diverse applications including …

item.title: OmniEdit: Building Image Editing Generalist Models Through Specialist Supervision
item.description: OmniEdit, a novel instruction-based image editing model, surpasses existing methods by leveraging specialist supervision and high-quality data, achieving superior performance across diverse editing ta…

item.title: StdGEN: Semantic-Decomposed 3D Character Generation from Single Images
item.description: StdGEN: Generate high-quality, semantically decomposed 3D characters from a single image in minutes, enabling flexible customization for various applications.

item.title: SG-I2V: Self-Guided Trajectory Control in Image-to-Video Generation
item.description: SG-I2V: Zero-shot controllable image-to-video generation using a self-guided approach that leverages pre-trained models for precise object and camera motion control.

item.title: SVDQunat: Absorbing Outliers by Low-Rank Components for 4-Bit Diffusion Models
item.description: SVDQuant boosts 4-bit diffusion models by absorbing outliers via low-rank components, achieving 3.5x memory reduction and 3x speedup on 12B parameter models.

item.title: Training-free Regional Prompting for Diffusion Transformers
item.description: Training-free Regional Prompting for FLUX boosts compositional text-to-image generation by cleverly manipulating attention mechanisms, achieving fine-grained control without retraining.

item.title: Constant Acceleration Flow
item.description: Constant Acceleration Flow (CAF) dramatically speeds up diffusion model generation by using a constant acceleration equation, outperforming state-of-the-art methods with improved accuracy and few-step…

item.title: Randomized Autoregressive Visual Generation
item.description: Randomized Autoregressive Modeling (RAR) sets a new state-of-the-art in image generation by cleverly introducing randomness during training to improve the model’s ability to learn from bidirectional c…

item.title: In-Context LoRA for Diffusion Transformers
item.description: In-Context LoRA empowers existing text-to-image models for high-fidelity multi-image generation by simply concatenating images and using minimal task-specific LoRA tuning.

item.title: HelloMeme: Integrating Spatial Knitting Attentions to Embed High-Level and Fidelity-Rich Conditions in Diffusion Models
item.description: HelloMeme enhances text-to-image models by integrating spatial knitting attentions, enabling high-fidelity meme video generation while preserving model generalization.
